Most Illustrious Sir

Having obtained exemptions from the service of the 1st Line, as the enlistment time of the following ranks of the 2nd Cavalry Corps has expired: José Coutinho de Almeida, Jeremias José Pinho, Antônio Soares de Oliveira, Francisco de Quevedo, Francisco Rodrigues de Morais, João Antônio Granada, Daniel José de Araújo, and José Bernardino de Oliveira; and as all are going to reside in this department, may Your Excellency please

God preserve Your Excellency Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Commander of Police of the Department of Boqueirão. Headquarters in Bagé, October 4, 1841. Serafim Joaquim de Alencastre, 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the Army General Staff.

Secretary of the Presidency of the Republic General Chief of Police of the department of Boqueirão, from the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the General Staff.

Office of the 1st Deputy of the General Chief of the General Staff, of October 4, received on the 29th of the same month, regarding the men dismissed from the 1st Line.
